(B) Brunelleschi's demonstration
(C) Multiple vanishing points
(D) Linear perspective

What of these is TRUE about how they represented distance in early Western art?
(A) people farther away were drawn to vanish on the horizon
(B) nearer people were drawn lower or drawn to cover the people farther away
(C) people farther away were drawn with hazier colors
(D) nearer people were drawn larger and brighter
